oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Group of US belt, box, and cartridge box plates
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The oval "US" plate was made from brass and lead filled. The oval plates with hooks were used on the waist belt. The oval plate with wire fasteners were placed on the outside flap of the cartridge box. The round plate with the eagle was worn on the cartrdige box sling. The square plate with eagle is an example of the type sold to Union officers for use on sword belts.
